How to Delete Your Account

  1. Open the app and navigate to the Settings screen.
  2. Tap the Delete Account option to open popup.
  3. Tap Enter Password to proceed.
  4. Press the Delete button to confirm account deletion.
  5. Press the Delete button to confirm account deletion.
  6. Your account will be permanently deleted.
